body: So like what is the punishment eg: 1st offence is a one day ban, what comes after that?
body_tagged: So like what is the punishment eg: 1st offence is a one day ban, what comes after that?
title: Void logging punishments?

replies.body: It becomes longer and eventually becomes a ban, don't know the exact numbers though.
replies.body_tagged: It becomes longer and eventually becomes a ban, don't know the exact numbers though.

replies.body:
Combat/Void Logging - Temporary Ban: 1 Day | 3 Days | 7 Days | Permanent

That's the guideline so expect punishments for void logging to be similar to this.
replies.body_tagged:
Combat/Void Logging - Temporary Ban: 1 Day | 3 Days | 7 Days | Permanent

That's the guideline so expect punishments for void logging to be similar to this.
